meanings.definition: A person who holds a subordinate position as a secretary.
meanings.sent1: The office had several subsecretaries assisting the main secretary.
meanings.sent2: The subsecretaries were responsible for organizing the files in the office.
meanings.sent3: The subsecretaries tried to type with their eyes closed for fun.
meanings.sent4: The subsecretaries were the unsung heroes behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The subsecretaries diligently managed the office tasks.
